Package competitions

Class Match

java.lang.Object
competitions.Match
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, Sauvegardable
public class Match
extends java.lang.Object
implements Sauvegardable
Author:
SADI Amayas, KOLLI Hamid

Cette classe permet de repésenter un match de football
